CustomField.description: Use this option to change the hover color of choice based questions. Use hex or RGB color code as a value.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Answer Choice Button Hover Color allows you to change the hover color of choice-based questions in the survey responder interface. You can use a hex or RGB color code as a value to define the desired hover color for the answer choice buttons. When a participant hovers over a choice option, the button will change its color according to the specified hover color, providing visual feedback and enhancing the interactive experience during the survey response process.
CustomField.label: Answer Choice Button Hover Color
